li.a: Why Choose E. Carver Co. Schools?
Examples of Student Learning in E. Carver Co. Schools

div.class: et_pb_column et_pb_column_1_3 et_pb_column_2 et_pb_css_mix_blend_mode_passthrough et-last-child et_pb_column_empty

div.a: Meals for Kids During School Closure

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-4122497 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-general

div.p: Whether it's been teaching and supporting students in our schools and classrooms, keeping our buildings clean and maintained, or providing daily administrative supports, this year's retirees have made a difference in the lives of children and families in our district...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-4122491 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-general

h2.a: District earns Certificate of Excellence in Finance Reporting Award

div.p: For the ninth consecutive year, the district has received the Certificate of Excellence in Finance Reporting Award. This award recognizes excellent, comprehensive financial reporting by the Association of School Business Officials International (ASBO). This honor...

article.class: et_pb_post clearfix et_pb_no_thumb post-4122477 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-general

div.p: Meals for kids during school closure During the district’s long-term closure, Nutrition Services is providing meals for children under the age of 19 who need them. Meals for the week are distributed on Mondays and Wednesdays at Clover Ridge Elementary and Riverview...
